overview:
Tina is an online marketer with a foot in both the engineering and marketing worlds. Modern marketers require an analytic streak in addition to an intuitive sensibility as to what will resonate with prospects. So spanning from the point of being discovered (being in the right place, advertising, Social Media, and SEO) to online conversion (good design and A/B testing) and then nurture (email marketing) and retention (customer service and delivering a good product), she has experience with the whole spectrum of bringing people to a product or service, and then keeping them a happy customer…all to the benefit of your venture.

Born in raised in New Hampshire, Tina has a BS in Product Design Engineering from Stanford University and an MBA from the Whittemore School of Business at UNH, and she has spent her career in Hi Tech. Being skilled in so many facets of business, she is great in start-ups (or small divisions of large companies) where multiple hats must be worn to get the job done well and quickly.
